# DEPARTMENT OF STATE TELEGRAM
**UNCLASSIFIED**

::: {.cable-meta}
:::


1. HOY (DAILY) REPORTED THAT FOR. MIN. GUZMAN STATED ON
HIS RETURN FROM BUENOS AIRES THAT PRESIDENT PERON HAS GIVEN
PRECISE INSTRUCTIONS TO HIGH-LEVEL GOA NEGOTIATING
COMMISSION TO MAKE POSSIBLE SIGNING OF GAS AND PETROLEUM
AGREEMENTS WITH BOLIVIA AS SOON AS POSSIBLE. GUZMAN STATED
AGREEMENTS WILL BE SIGNED BY PRESIDENTS PERON AND BANZER
BEFORE END OF 1974 AND THAT PERON BELIEVES THESE AGREEMENTS
SHOULD BE ACCELERATED BECAUSE THEY WILL BE VERY BENEFICIAL
GUZMAN ADDED THAT "ALL COMMERCIAL RELATIONS WILL BE DEFINED
AND RESOLVED WITH THE SIGNING OF THE AGREEMENT..."
2. MARCELO OSTRIA, DIRECTOR GENERAL OF FOREIGN POLICY,
WESTERN AREA CONFIRMED SUBSTANCE PARA 1.






 202055Z


STEDMAN
